verses.text: \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*,\f + \fr 94:1 \ft LORD or GOD in all caps is from the Hebrew יהוה Yahweh except when otherwise noted as being from the short form יה Yah.\f* you \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* whom \w vengeance|strong="H5360"\w* belongs, you \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* whom \w vengeance|strong="H5360"\w* belongs, \w shine|strong="H3313"\w* out.
